summary: This document is a certificate of corporate resolutions from a corporation authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage various accounts on behalf of the corporation. It includes the names of authorized signers, including Jeffrey Epstein, who is designated to execute agreements and manage the accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for the corporation's accounts with Deutsche Bank, indicating his role in managing the corporation's financial affairs.

persons.name: Darren Inctyke
persons.context: Darren Inctyke is mentioned as another authorized signer for the corporation's accounts, indicating his involvement in the financial management alongside Epstein.

connections.description: Both individuals are authorized signers for the corporation's accounts, suggesting a professional relationship in managing the corporation's finances.

keyFacts: The document certifies corporate resolutions allowing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage accounts for the corporation.
Jeffrey Epstein is named as an authorized signer for the corporation's accounts.
Darren Inctyke is also listed as an authorized signer, indicating a shared responsibility in managing the accounts.
The document outlines the powers granted to the authorized signers regarding the management of the corporation's financial accounts.
The resolutions state that the bank may rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.
